sen.j: 主人公である浜松中納言と継父左大将の娘、大姫との悲恋、そして夢告で亡父が唐土の皇子に転生したと知り、彼を求めて渡唐し、かの地で出会った后との恋と別れ、といった様々な女性たちとのめぐりあいを主題としている。
sen.e: Themes are enters with various ladies such as tragic love between the hero, Hamamatsu Chunagon and Daihime, a daughter of his stepfather, Sadaisho, and, knowing through revelation in a dream that the deceased father reincarnated as a prince of China, visit to Chine to meet him and love and farewell with the empress whom the hero met in China.

Themes focus on the tragic love between various ladies and the hero, Hamamatsu Chunagon, such as with Daihime - a daughter of his stepfather, Sadaisho - who, seeing in a dream that her dead father was reincarnated as a prince of China, visited to China to meet him, and the love and parting with the empress whom the hero met in China.

The main theme focuses on the love affairs between Hamamatsu Chunagon, the main character and various ladies; such as a tragic love with Daihime, a daughter of his stepfather, Sadaisho, and then, a love and parting with the empress in Tang (China) where he went to see his dead father who visited his dream and telling him that he reincarnated as a prince of Tang.

sen.j: 夢のお告げや輪廻転生を軸とした超常的な恋物語である。
sen.e: They are paranormal love stories based on revelation in a dream and Rinne Tensho (all things being in flux through the endless circle of birth, death, and rebirth, the circle of transmigration).
